trans_title: 达伦·布朗：末世 第一季
introduction: The Master, Derren Brown is back in 2012 - He uses hypnosis on a lad as he unleashes the "Apocalypse" - Derren's most audacious plan yet - to convince one person that the planet has been devastated by a catastrophic meteorite strike, as a lethal infected now roaming the land and he is one of a mere handful of survivors.Our 'survivor' is someone who takes life for granted, and has yet to truly value what he has. The adventure that awaits him is meticulously crafted to give him the ultimate wake-up call, and teach him valuable life-lessons.
chinese_title: 达伦·布朗：末世 第一季
